title: Alliance for Prosperity
mission: Create a more prosperous world with mission-aligned organizations

form.name: Name
form.contribution: How might you contribute to the Alliance?

affirmations.smallTitle: Take action to solve real-world problems
affirmations.title: What the Alliance stands for
affirmations.laboratoriaBelief: We believe we have a lot to learn from <0>one another.</0>
affirmations.laboratoriaCopy: Hosting a design-a-thon with young female coding students in Mexico exploring ideas for blockchain technology.
affirmations.wfpBelief: We believe in designing <0>with communities</0>, not for them.
affirmations.wfpCopy: Collaborating to bring financial tools to refugees.
affirmations.cLabsBelief: We believe systems are complex and require <0>collaboration.</0>
affirmations.cLabsCopy: Exploring how to bring more Filipino merchants & consumers  into the formal economy.

categoryText.preserve: Preserve natural resources by supporting projects through Celo rewards
categoryText.accept: Enable your communities to easily pay for mobile top ups, utilities, and shopping online with cUSD
categoryText.acquire: Make it easy to acquire cUSD in digital wallets
categoryText.send: Send remittances almost anywhere, instantly for as little as $.01
categoryText.lend: Accelerate speed of delivery and reduce costs by lending cUSD
categoryText.earn: Allow communities to earn stable, digital assets for lending their talents for various tasks
categoryText.save: Help your communities overcome inflation and build for their future by saving in cUSD
categoryText.give: Increase transparency, reduce fraud, and increase mobility by giving cUSD
categoryText.educate: Incentivize communities to learn about Celo and actively engage with the Celo platform
categoryText.grow: Grow the Celo platform through the purchase of the native token, cGLD
categoryText.secure: Keep identity, assets, and the network secure
categoryText.build: Deliver innovative solutions for your customers by building on the Celo platform

benefits.headline: Benefits of collaborating on a mission-driven blockchain
benefits.title: What the Alliance offers
offerings: Build and shape improvements to the Celo platform
Expand your reach to help more communities
